entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
